name: Flare (heise-kun)
description:
Stranded in a frigid alien wasteland equipped with only a flare gun, you must traverse ancient ruins, befriend giant cattle and solve puzzles in order to reach the summit and get rescued.

Programmers:
Alex Möller
Anna Göransson
Charlie Berner
Fredrik Sandberg
Martin Andersson
Ricky Chau
